
= DirectHost =

This component is a very minimal container for [HTTPBrowser] and [HTTPServer] components. This excerpt from the NED file explains in the simplest possible terms:

{{{
module DirectHost
    parameters:
        numTcpApps: numeric const,		// The number of tcpApps in the array
        tcpAppType: string;			// The type of contained tcpApps
    submodules:
        tcpApp: tcpAppType[numTcpApps] like TCPApp;
            display: "p=163,67;i=block/app";
    connections nocheck:
endmodule
}}}
